page.description: Pastes copied controls from the clipboard onto the current or separate UX component. In order to copy controls use the '[Copy selected controls to clipboard]' option. If you want to duplicate controls within a UX page you can also use the '[Duplicate selected controls]' option.

step.description: Use the '[Copy selected controls to clipboard]' option to copy a set of controls to the clipboard.
Open a new component in the UX Builder. On the UX Controls page click the 'Menu' dropdown in the toolbar. Select the Paste controls from clipboard option.
Select where you want to paste the controls in the controls tree and click the 'Paste from Clipboard' button.
The control will be added to the new component.
